title: City bus information
description: Details about bus stops near the University campus

^name(_[a-z]+)?$.description: Name of the bus company. Add the locale modifier for names in different languages

^link(_[a-z]+)?$.description: URL of the link to the company's website. Add the locale modifier for URLs in different languages

stopDetails.description: Set of stop IDs and various details about them

.+.description: Details about a bus stop, including location and routes which service it, referenced by an ID

lat.description: Latitude of the location of the stop

long.description: Longitude of the location of the stop

items.description: Details about the bus stops near a campus

lat.description: Latitude of the location of the campus

long.description: Longitude of the location of the campus

stops.description: Set of stop ids and the routes which service them.

.+.description: Routes that service the stop and times they depart

items.description: Details about a route that services the stop

days.description: Keys represent days that the bus services the list of times it points to, where 0 is Monday

^[0-6]+$.description: Times that a route services the stop on the days represented in the key

items.description: 24 hour time. Times past 24 hours represent times after midnight

^name(_[a-z]+)?$.description: Name of the campus. Add the locale modifier for names in different languages
